title: Custom skins
body:
I was wondering it was possible for someone to reccomend me a program to display custom skins, you know, just for myself.
Skin Installer Ultimate and Wooxy appear to both be non functioning for me, but I can't seem to find any other program for it. Help would be appreciated!

replies.body:
I certainly can't suggest one, since [our official stance](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848-Third-Party-Applications) states that we don't support them and choosing to use one is **at your own risk**.

Let me know if you have any questions.
